All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Circle
    Draws a circle.
    DemoDrawingSurface
    A trivial demonstration (and test) of the DrawingSurface features.
    DialogPosition
    Represents the pre-defined positions, relative to the window, for a dialog box when presented on the screen.
    DialogType
    Used to control the appearance of a dialog when it is presented to the user.
    Drawable
    Contract for a graphic than can be drawn on the DrawingSurface.
    DrawingSurface
    Provides graphical services for a set of Drawables, allowing pixels, predefined shapes, and images to be drawn on a graphical workspace.
    Ellipse
    Draws an ellipse.
    Fractal
    Abstract class to support plotting portions of fractals.
    FractalArea
    Define common portions of Fractal sets (Mandelbrot and Julia).
    FractalColorScheme
    Color schemes for rendering fractal plots.
    FractalJulia
    Calculate and display portions of a Julia set.
    FractalMandelbrot
    Calculate and display portions of the Mandelbrot set.
    GameOfLife
    John Conway's Game of Life http://ddi.cs.uni-potsdam.de/HyFISCH/Produzieren/lis_projekt/proj_gamelife/ ConwayScientificAmerican.htm To use, create an instance and run it on a thread.
    GuiMode
    Operational modes for the UI.
    Image
    Displays an image.
    ImageType
    Represents the types of image files that can be saved by the library.
    LineSegment
    Draws a line segment between two points.
    MainFrame
    Central service for supplying a frame that refreshes the objects placed on its panel.
    MultiDrawingSurface1
    A simple DrawingSurface used for the MultiDrawingSurfaceTest.
    MultiDrawingSurface2
    A simple DrawingSurface used for the MultiDrawingSurfaceTest.
    MultiDrawingSurfaceTest
    Demonstrate an approach to managing multiple DrawingSurface instances and switching between them.
    PaddleLocation
    The zones of a paddle.
    Pen
    A class that acts as a pen - e.g.
    PenInterface  
    PenTest
    Basic Pen operation demonstration.
    Pixel
    Draws a single pixel.
    PlaySound
    Plays a sound.
    Pong
    Classic game of Pong.
    Rectangle
    Draws a rectangle.
    RequestFocusListener
    Convenience class to request focus on a component.
    ScrabbleBoard  
    ScrabbleCell  
    SetupDocFiles
    Run this program to setup the doc-files html entries for the sample programs
    SirQlateBoard
    An early mock-up of the main playing board for SirQlate.
    SoundFile
    A sound file available for the program
    SoundPlayer
    Interface for playing sounds
    SwingWidgets
    Simple demonstration of using JGF and Swing components on a DrawingSurface.
    Text
    Draws a text message on the drawing surface.
    Turtle
    Mimic the Turtle graphics control language.
    TurtleTest
    Various test of the Turtle language support library.
    Utility
    Utility methods to simplify common operations.
    VisibleObject
    Represents a visible object that can be drawn on a DrawingSurface.
    WindowMode
    Modes available when the initial window (frame) is created.
    WindowMode.Constants
    A set of constant flag values (must be powers of 2).
